content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Mr. Li. I understand that you are interested in renting it, but I must inform you that the rental price for this apartment is not negotiable. It is 1000 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Okay, I understand. Is there anything else I should know about the apartment before I make my decision?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: There is nothing else to know about the apartment, Mr. Li. It is a 25 square meter apartment located in a prime location in the city. It is fully furnished and equipped with all modern amenities. The rent includes utilities such as electricity, water, and gas. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, that's all I need to know. I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month.
Please sign here.
Thank you for considering my application.
Sincerely,
Baihu Li
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month.
Please sign here.
Thank you for considering my application.
Sincerely,
Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
